qor_5A97C406_content_delivery_constraint: Mobile customers will offer performance and content delivery. Deliver fast mobile experiences that increase commitment and conversions, regardless of distance to origin servers, device types, or network health.
qor_5A97C406_practice_metrics_quanti_ste: IDC, DevOps and the Cost of Downtime: Fortune 1000 Best Practices Metrics Quanti ed, Stephen Elliot, March 2015
